Plot: Worried that her next asthma attack may kill her, a woman (Whoopi Goldberg) tries to solve the problems of her estranged husband (Ving Rhames) and their four adult children (Kimberly Elise, Tichina Arnold, Mekhi Phifer, Anika Noni Rose)
Title: A Day Late and a Dollar Short
Actors: Whoopi Goldberg, Ving Rhames, Kimberly Elise, Mekhi Phifer
